title: Saisher
author: Saisher
content: When we gamble we feel all the emotions, like when we feel excited when we are chasing our losses, feeling happy when we won a big amount, feeling depressed when we lose and we feel frustrated when what we expected to happen did not materialize, this is one of the reasons why we cannot stop gambling because we feel all the emotions.Do you agree that we cannot stop gambling because it completed all our emotions and do you have other feelings when you gamble.

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: But feeling depressed is not good. Punters should look for means to gamble but avoid depression. This can be done with risking the amount you can lose and not think about it if lost but still feeling happy.

comments.author: MArsland
comments.body: Quote from: Saisher on November 10, 2022, 07:54:22 AMDo you agree that we cannot stop gambling because it completed all our emotions and do you have other feelings when you gamble. Obviously emotionally I agree that we cannot stop gambling if it is supported by funds and given a winning stimulus. But when my condition didn't have the funds to bet and the desire to gamble seemed to be fulfilled then what I did was switched to playing demo racing with my closest friends to collect as many wins as possible (at that time I thought I was struggling with real balances). Keep in mind this is only part of the trick so I can control my emotions. Personally, there are plenty of alternatives and people will have different options.

comments.author: piebeyb
comments.body: Quote from: Saisher on November 10, 2022, 07:54:22 AMWhen we gamble we feel all the emotions, like when we feel excited when we are chasing our losses, feeling happy when we won a big amount, feeling depressed when we lose and we feel frustrated when what we expected to happen did not materialize, this is one of the reasons why we cannot stop gambling because we feel all the emotions.Do you agree that we cannot stop gambling because it completed all our emotions and do you have other feelings when you gamble. if the goal is just to get a lot of money from the casino, I think that's what is instilled in our mindset to continue to chase it so that the more you lose playing at the casino, you will continue to be more curious and get more emotional because you don't get what you want to geteverything comes back to yourself and every risk is borne by yourself when you play you have to be ready for whatever it is, I've played and lost then emotional every time I make a deposit the more I realize I'm playing too far and finally I am now wiser in playing casino especially with the aim of just looking for fun not money so my mindset is not always curious, hopefully gambling addicts can play healthy and I'm sure they can stop being an addict

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Well that's true there is such a thing as positive and negative gambling, negative when you are depressed after you log out of the game whether you lose or you win, and positive when even if you lose you feel good because you lose with money that you can afford to lose and enjoy the experience, if you're gambling long enough you'll feel all the emotions its part of the game the most important is the positive is the one that you expeirienced the most.

comments.author: peter0425
comments.body: Quote from: Saisher on November 10, 2022, 07:54:22 AMDo you agree that we cannot stop gambling because it completed all our emotions and do you have other feelings when you gamble. completely agreed  mate , this is why most of those who turns addicted are the people that has Emotional weaknesses  because they are the one in which wanted to chase their losses instead of accepting the faith of the day and tries to recover in the coming days.also Emotions makes us eager to take our money back , that is why best to leave your emotion outside gambling premises .or if you are playing Online then best to bring only the amount you can lose and don't take another amount to challenge the luck .

comments.author: traderethereum
comments.body: We can quit after playing a few times but not many can do that because if they lose, they will be more eager to recover from that defeat than choose to quit.Those emotions will only get bigger if we don't stop immediately and we often feel angry and wonder why we lost.I try to suppress any feelings that come to me while I am gambling because it can affect my self-control and in the end, I will be tempted to continue playing.It won't help me to avoid bigger losses and will give me a lot of losses after playing a few rounds.

comments.author: livingfree
comments.body: Quote from: Saisher on November 10, 2022, 07:54:22 AMWhen we gamble we feel all the emotions, like when we feel excited when we are chasing our losses, feeling happy when we won a big amount, feeling depressed when we lose and we feel frustrated when what we expected to happen did not materialize, this is one of the reasons why we cannot stop gambling because we feel all the emotions.Do you agree that we cannot stop gambling because it completed all our emotions and do you have other feelings when you gamble. I agree that when someone can't stop himself to gamble even if he's already on a losing streak, it's because that he has let his feelings and emotions conquer his control. When you've allowed your emotion to control over you, you'll forget about everything and you're all set to think that it's all going to be recovery of your losses. But you also understand that it won't do no good anymore and you're like throwing your money in every place you gamble because that's how adrenaline works.

comments.author: Kemarit
comments.body: Quote from: Saisher on November 10, 2022, 07:54:22 AMWhen we gamble we feel all the emotions, like when we feel excited when we are chasing our losses, feeling happy when we won a big amount, feeling depressed when we lose and we feel frustrated when what we expected to happen did not materialize, this is one of the reasons why we cannot stop gambling because we feel all the emotions.Do you agree that we cannot stop gambling because it completed all our emotions and do you have other feelings when you gamble. Partly yes, gambling has played our emotions to the maximum, give us that satisfaction, but when we lose, we want to recover and make a comeback. And that usually happens, so it's really hard to control and then we become addicted to it.That's why most of the time it's really hard to quit, as we want to get that feeling again, specially if we win big. We want to experience that same feeling and again. And so if we want to quit gambling, it's going to be a fight inside of us and it's not going to be easy.

comments.author: GiftedMAN
comments.body: Quote from: Oshosondy on November 10, 2022, 07:57:19 AMBut feeling depressed is not good. Punters should look for means to gamble but avoid depression. This can be done with risking the amount you can lose and not think about it if lost but still feeling happy.This advice isn't new to gamblers especially the responsible ones if you can not afford to lose big amounts then gamble within your financial capacity, a lot of people are depressed after losing in gambling because of gambling with borrowed funds and amounts they can't afford to lose this case is mostly seen in the addicted gamblers and beginners in the gambling business. I have a passion for gambling but I have limits to which I gamble once the amount set aside for my gambling is reached, I can not gamble again and I don't think about my losses once am done.

comments.author: gantez
comments.body: Quote from: Saisher on November 10, 2022, 07:54:22 AMDo you agree that we cannot stop gambling because it completed all our emotions and do you have other feelings when you gamble. Why can't someone stop to gamble when you are having more lose to what you gain? Like the emotion making you to gamble and lose, if you don't stop this will lead you into the depression state of your mind and you can't think straight. This can be a different view but we the good reason. Everybody can't be the same person, when you are going negative you will stop doing the gambling because no more to continue doing the lifestyle.

comments.author: jakdanyel
comments.body: Quote from: Saisher on November 10, 2022, 07:54:22 AMWhen we gamble we feel all the emotions, like when we feel excited when we are chasing our losses, feeling happy when we won a big amount, feeling depressed when we lose and we feel frustrated when what we expected to happen did not materialize, this is one of the reasons why we cannot stop gambling because we feel all the emotions.Do you agree that we cannot stop gambling because it completed all our emotions and do you have other feelings when you gamble. I agree with all of these feelings. I also experience every emotion when I gamble. But mainly for me; gambling means adrenaline. This is where the basis for experiencing every emotion in the body comes from when gambling. You get excited when you gamble. It's just like doing extreme sports. If you win, your excitement turns into happiness. If you lose, it'll be like a car accident. I wish everyone an accident-free ride

comments.author: Frankolala
comments.body: You are right OP gambling controls our emotion and if not care we can become addicts due to our incapacity to control our emotions when gambling. When losing you become eager and desperate to recover your lost this leads to more losing. Winning big makes you happy and you feel like winning more gambles which makes you keep playing before you know it,you might lose all the funds you won. It is good we can control our emotions when gambling by having limits and a certain amount we spend on gambling,stopping at the right time shows how discipline gambler and can also help in controlling your emotion. I have seen a girl that steals to gamble in other to win back her lost this shows she can't control her emotion.

comments.author: maydna
comments.body: Quote from: gantez on November 10, 2022, 10:41:54 AMQuote from: Saisher on November 10, 2022, 07:54:22 AMDo you agree that we cannot stop gambling because it completed all our emotions and do you have other feelings when you gamble. Why can't someone stop to gamble when you are having more lose to what you gain? Like the emotion making you to gamble and lose, if you don't stop this will lead you into the depression state of your mind and you can't think straight. This can be a different view but we the good reason. Everybody can't be the same person, when you are going negative you will stop doing the gambling because no more to continue doing the lifestyle.People can't stop gambling when they lose because they want to recover from their losses, so they continue to play without thinking about how much money they have used. You don't have to be like those who continue to play gambling, especially if you have lost a lot, although it seems normal if you want to recover from that loss. And don't make gambling a lifestyle because you don't know how much money you can use, especially if you suffer that loss. This can also trigger you to experience depression due to the defeat, so you cannot think clearly. I don't have any other feelings when I gamble because I only want to enjoy my time by playing gambling.

comments.author: FatFork
comments.body: Most of the gamblers do gamble because they want to feel something. They might be feeling excited when they are chasing their losses and they might feel happy when they win a big jackpot, so in that way, we could conclude that without emotions, it is not gambling anymore but just a game which will not have any meaning for the player anymore.But for me, the main reason why I gamble every day is to get away from my daily life and all the stress that comes with it. I like to gamble because it makes me feel that I am living in the moment and not thinking about anything else but just focusing on playing. I am not a professional gambler and I have no intention of becoming one in the future, but gambling gives me a lot of fun and pleasure, and I think it's the reason why I keep coming back to it.

comments.author: fortunecrypto
comments.body: Nothing like a roller coaster ride of feeling we become human beings when we feel everything, and this is why gambling attracts us whatever we do here we feel something, whether we lose or win, it gives us something and that something is why we always come back to gamble, in fact, there are people who don't care if they win or lose, they just want the feeling of excitement when they are betting, its the feeling not the results for them.

comments.author: Strongkored
comments.body: It's hard not to involve emotions when playing, as well as when betting on sports, many choose a team just because it's their favorite team in fact the team they choose is impossible to winAll the feelings experienced by all players are almost the same, happy when you win, disappointed when you lose and always want to feel that sensation again.However, chasing victory because you want to cover previous losses is not what players should do, this can lead players to making mistakes when making decisions.If there is a player who feels depressed because of gambling it may be time to quit from gambling activities in certain time because he could be using the money for important purposes or even from borrowing or become addiction.

comments.author: Unsoldier
comments.body: I agree with OP. A person experiences a lot of emotions when gambling. This makes it hard to quit gambling. But from this statement we can make a conclusion which will help to quit gambling. If a person will experience a great range of emotions from his other hobby it will help to quit gambling.

comments.author: Bananington
comments.body: Quote from: Saisher on November 10, 2022, 07:54:22 AMWhen we gamble we feel all the emotions, like when we feel excited when we are chasing our losses, feeling happy when we won a big amount, feeling depressed when we lose and we feel frustrated when what we expected to happen did not materialize, this is one of the reasons why we cannot stop gambling because we feel all the emotions.It sounds really stressful and completely against some peoples reason for gambling which they say is to relax. I have heard people say they turn to gambling after a stressful day as a way to relax. If truly all this emotions are experienced and attached every time they gamble, that can be stressful to experience and very unhealthy and a danger to someone who is prone to hypertension or depression. I also think if as an individual that gambles and then experience these emotions, and you know they are too much for you to deal with, do yourself a favor and try to quit.

comments.author: danherbias07
comments.body: Quote from: Saisher on November 10, 2022, 07:54:22 AMWhen we gamble we feel all the emotions, like when we feel excited when we are chasing our losses, feeling happy when we won a big amount, feeling depressed when we lose and we feel frustrated when what we expected to happen did not materialize, this is one of the reasons why we cannot stop gambling because we feel all the emotions.Do you agree that we cannot stop gambling because it completed all our emotions and do you have other feelings when you gamble. I do agree. Excitement always makes you come back for more. The joy gambling brings whenever you are winning and the feeling of being triumphant against the house or you predicted it right when it comes to sports gambling.  I don't feel excited though when I am chasing losses, maybe we have different emotions when in that zone. It's a mixed feeling of being depressed and eagerness to take back what should've been mine.
